title: DOCX Markdown Converter Settings
description: Configuration schema for the docxMarkdownConverter VS Code extension

docxMarkdownConverter.outputFolderStrate.description: Where to place the output markdown file relative to the source
enumDescriptions: Place markdown in the same folder as the source DOCX file
Create a subfolder named after the document for markdown and images

docxMarkdownConverter.imagesFolderName.description: Name pattern for the images folder. Use {docname} for the source document name.

docxMarkdownConverter.imageFileNamePatte.description: Pattern for naming extracted image files. Use {index} for sequential numbering (e.g., 001, 002).

docxMarkdownConverter.overwriteBehavior.description: How to handle existing output files
enumDescriptions: Ask the user what to do when a file already exists
Automatically overwrite existing files without asking
Skip conversion if output file already exists
Automatically rename the output file to avoid conflicts

docxMarkdownConverter.pasteTarget.description: Where to place content when pasting from clipboard
enumDescriptions: Create a new markdown file for the pasted content
Insert the converted markdown at the cursor in the current editor

docxMarkdownConverter.openAfterConversio.description: Automatically open the generated markdown file after conversion
